# inkType

**Instance Property**

The type of ink, such as pen or pencil, as defined in the [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkType] enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
var inkType: __PKInkType { get }
```

## Getting the ink attributes

- **color**: The base color for this ink.

items.description: The base color for this ink.
